data.title: Apartment for 4 people Bovec near Soča
data.meta_description: Planning a vacation in Slovenia? Looking for cheap accommodation? At Sobodajalstvo Boris Zorko you can rent an apartment for 4 people in Bovec near Soča.
data.text:
Bovec is one of the most popular destinations in Slovenia, in large part due to the many sports activities available in the area, such as:

kayaking

rafting,

climbing,

fishing,

cycling ...

Tourists from Slovenia, Europe and all over the world visit us every year to experience everything our small slavic country on "the sunny side of the Alps" has to offer. If you are among them, we offer an affordable apartment for 4 people in Bovec near Soča.

For a low price, you can enjoy a shorter or longer stay at a newly furnished apartment that is located at the very center of Bovec. Near the apartment there is a grocery store and a playground.

At our apartment for 4 people in Bovec near Soča you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay, along with three private parking spaces and a bike shed.

Our guests can enjoy good weather in the fenced garden with lounge chairs and a BBQ oven. They may also indulge in the seasonal vegetables straight from our garden free of charge!

For guests that stay at our apartment for 4 people in Bovec near Soča who are of age, we have also arranged a wine rack with the excellent wines Mavrič - for more information about the wine prices, contact us!

Apartment for 4 people Bovec

Our accommodation is perfect for couples as well as smaller families and groups of friends, who wish to experience one of the most exciting regions of Slovenia together.

If you are staying at our apartment for 4 people in Bovec near Soča for the first time, we are happy to give you pointers where to go.
